content.detailedDescription: Below is a summary of two written witness narratives that were included withthis report.  i was in lansing driving west on rt. 496.  the object was a pure white coloragainst the dark sky.  my mind was in question and i felt confused. i reallycould not come to a conclusion at first.  when i first saw the object i knewthere was something different about its appearance.  as the object came closerand traveled at a distance to the right, and overhead of my car i watched in astate of being extremely curious and speechless.  i felt surprised that i wasviewing the object in the air.  traveling at 55 miles an hour on rt. 496 theentire time of viewing took less than three minutes.  i could say that theobject was no closer than a mile away.  leaving rt. 496 i turned onto rt. 96west toward grand rapids.  after going past the grand ledge exit i noticedanother light in the sky.  i stopped the car to get a closer look at the lightand noticed that it was a helicopter shining a spot light at the ground.  i gotback into the car and drove home.
content.summary: 890608 - ifo in lansing mi - helicopter
Orange disc
#890613 - ifo seen in montrose, michigan- star
Spotted a large rectangular shaped object

content.detailedDescription: The following is a summary of the 3 page field investigator report:at about 1:00 a.M. tuesday aug. 28, two teenagers were behind the otherteenagers home "looking at the stars when they sighted an object in thesouthern sky.  the object appeared as a point of light about 20 degrees abovethe horizon and had the brightness of an uncovered lightbulb they said.  theobject blinked off and on.  they said the object was brighter than the brighteststars and that when the object blinked off the surrounding stars remainedbright.  there was no sound, and the object appeared white.  the object oversome time, gained altitude until it was about 40 degrees above thesouth-southwest horizon over a large tree in the back yard.  at times the objectstood still, at others it sped up.  the object also remained bright for sometime, then faded out, flashed and flickered.  when the object disappearednothing was visible in the proximity.  the male teenage witness claimed thatwhen he flashed his flashlight off and on at the object, it blinked back inone-second intervals.  the object did not move behind anything, and thewitnesses believe it kept in front of the clouds.At 2:00 a.M. the calhoun county sheriff department in marshall was contacted andtwo deputies were dispatched (none being the primary witness of this report). when they arrived they observed the object in the front yard of the maleteenagers residence for 10-15 minutes.  one of the deputies flashed his lightat it, but it didnt respond as before.  the deputies left at 2:45 a.M. and theyleft instructions that should the object make a sudden move, the teenagersshould come downtown to find them.  at about 3:30 a.M. one of the teenagers saidthe object "shot right up in the air" about eight to 10 degrees over the tree.The teenagers estimated that the object was about five to seven miles distant inthe southwest. the male teenager called the sheriffs dept. at 3:45 a.M. afterattempting to drive and find the deputies. he said the object seemed to have ared light going around the bottom.  at this time the primary witness in thisreport (the 28 y/o deputy sheriff) and his partner were in the area of 26 mileroad and i-94 when they saw something "pop up" in the southwest in the directionof athens.  they described the object as pale yellow or white, and said it made"silly maneuvers", moving straight up and down in the sky.  the deputies becameexcited and said they were not kidding when asked by the dispatcher.  they saidthe object was emitting red and blue lights.  the object "disappeared" and at3:48 a.M. the object returned to view and began making "sharp circle turns" and"perpendicular turns".  it was still in view at 3:53 a.M.  these two deputiesthen called another deputy to the scene who also saw the object.  this primarywitness and this third deputy said the object vanished from sight by "simplygoing out" and was last seen high (about 80 degrees) in the northeast sky.  thewitness stated it looked like it was traveling higher and higher.  the objectseemed like a small ball, about the size of a dime held at arms length.  twoalbion police officers also reported observing the object in the east-southeastwhile patrolling in an alley.  these two deputies said the object got dimmer,then brighter, and at times completely out.  they later joined the otherdeputies and one said the object appeared to be bright, and seemed to havecontrol or a set course.  dispatchers at the time attempted to explain theobject as a "stray rocket", but one of the officers said the object "jettednorth...Stopped and stayed in one place and didnt move anymore".  the objectalso "moved south at a speed that was too fast to watch with a pair ofbinoculars."
content.summary: Calhoun county sheriffs see ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside, in front of my home, waiting for my family. i noticedthe movement as i would an airplane overhead. i knew it was not a plane as ithalted movement. immediately, i called for my family to come out and see. mysister, brother, and a neighbor came out. after they all came out, i ran insideto find a camera (7e30sec), the camera was not in the location i thought it was, so i ran backoutside. the object then began to move away at a 45-degree angle. the objectjust shrunk in size, then it was gone. we then called the schenectady countyairport, however, we were directed to call back during business hours. i didfind a reference to the object in the grolier encyclopedia science supplement1969, page 56. this object we saw is identical to the one paul trentphotographed in oregon on may 11, 1950. our sighting took place in schenectady,ny on august of 1970. i felt compelled to write this, even though it took placeover 30 years ago. i hope it will help your database efforts.
content.summary: Visual sighting similar to paul trents object in oregon.

content.detailedDescription: 1 : i was in the city and i was getting out of the car2 : i was looking at thesky , then i saw it3 : i tought emediently that was not an airplane 4 : i wasvery asstound and i called my friend 5 : 2 orange balls moving from north tosouth/west at very high speed 6 : it moved out of sight over the horizoni dontbelieve that it was a airplane because it was moving to fast and i didnt thinkthat it was a meteor because it moved in a pair and didnt leave a trail.Kindregards h. van der putten
content.summary: 2 orange balls traveling at high speed

content.detailedDescription: Field investigators narrative:on saturday, aug. 25, 1973, in battle creek, michigan, mrs. ___ was driving heraunt, mrs. ___, along dickman road approaching the city of springfield (adjacentto battle creek). as the car approached 20th street, mrs. ___ slowed for atraffic light.  the time was about 6:00 p.M.  mrs. ___ saw what she firstthought was a balloon high to her right and stationary in the air, apparentlyover a business place on dickman road.  at first she thought it was anadvertising gimmick and looked for a sign or lettering. there was none.  "itlooked like a small dirigible or baby blimp", she said.  "there was no gondolavisible but i saw what appeared to be two fins near the rear.  these werewhite."  the rest of the object seemed to be a self-luminous yellow color.  "theobject remained fixed and we drove away from it," she said.  "i continued tolook back on it until it was obstructed from my view.  on our return over thesame route it was gone (later)".  she described the object as "an elongatedyellow object stationary in the air, with a "nose" larger in proportion to therest of the object.  a drawing is included in her report.  mrs. ___ didntreport the sighting until after hearing a publicized sighting report on aug. 28,in an attempt to substantiate the claims of the nine witnesses of that latersighting.  the fi notes that the above report was not publicized.
content.summary: Blimplike object seen near springfield, michigan

content.detailedDescription: looking out kitchen window i saw two fire trailsheading upward eastern sky i grab my cammera and photograph a object cuttingacross s w skys several photos were taken of the objectsd not(bland pugh)notified. after several attempts unfruitful to contact thiswitness i am declaring this case closed.Bland pughflorida state director3-12-02
content.summary: Object with fire trail eastern sky early mornning

content.detailedDescription: Summary of the witness narrative included within a letter to dr. hynek datedapril 12, 1973:my sister and i saw a flying saucer in october of 1957 on a thursday eveningabout 10:00 oclock in allen park, mich.  i was driving east and stopped for ared light. i glanced up and saw this round, reddish orange saucer object about30 feet in diameter going west andit was about 15 or 20 feet above the treetops.  i told my sister to look at it and asked if she thought we should turnaround and follow it, so we did.  we followed it about a block or two and thenthe saucer headed south-west and then took off very fast.  my sister said shecould see two figures dressed in what looked like to her, white navy uniforms. she said one was standing at what she thought was an architects drawing boardand the other one walked toward him and around him and then walked toward thewindow.  the saucer was too high up for her to notice the faces.  i did not seethe figures because i was trying to watch the traffic as well as thesaucer....My sister and i have good reputations.  we teach school and do notdrink alcoholic beverages and , and do not have hallucinations and do not telllies or make up stories.....
content.summary: Occupants in navy uniforms seen in allen park, mic

content.detailedDescription: Witness narrative:duration 10 secondsweather clear and warmmy cousin ____ and i were sitting on the screened in porch of my god mothershouse looking out at the wooded pasture across the road when this objectappeared to our left (south) moving in a path across the front of the house(house faces west) and disappeared behind the tops of the trees.The object was shaped like a saucer with shiny surfaces and emitting light fromthe bottom.  it made no sound.  it appeared to follow a straight path at approx20 mph.Because the pasture is in a gulley and the house is on a small hill the objectwas just above eye level so we could see the side and bottom as it passeddirectly in front of us.  when it had disappeared we ran in the house and toldmy god mother who was in her mid to late fifties at the time.  she said we werejust seeing things and dismissed it at that.
content.summary: Saucer emits light in dundee, michigan - 1957

content.detailedDescription: Witness narrative:on my way home (from work) tuesday 22 (morning of the 23rd) of may i washeading east on i-94, turned south on southfield road, which is a two lanedivided highway.  thats when i noticed 3 bright lights comming toward me.  myfirst though was that aircraft is really low and slow.  im an aircraft mechanicby trade and have been around planes for 30 years.  i slowed down my car toaround 20 mph and rolled down the window, there wasnt any noise.  it seemed tobe approx. 1000 feet above me going about 20 mph, it was an elongated trianglewith bright lights at each point.  it passed over me and i turned down a sidestreet to turn around which took about thirty seconds.  stopped my car and gotout. it was gone.  the next day i told the guys at work an they were kidding me. they know that im not a b.S.-r.  yesterday one of the guys at work saw a newsprogram and there were other people who saw the same thing as i did.
content.summary: Triangle formation of lights seen in allen park, m

content.detailedDescription: I was called out side by my brother and his friend.  i went outside and saw thelights, the ufos.  there were 4 of them moving in circular like paths and thencrossing in the middle it took about 6 seconds from the time the met to the timethey met again.  we watched them for 20 minutes then i had to go inside. it was37 degrees fareinhet ant the time i went inside. they faded away into thedistance.
content.summary: 4 bright white lights projecting downwards onto ci

content.detailedDescription: we were driving westbound, and had slowed to makea turn, when kaitlyn pointed out flashing lights in the sky, directly in frontof us. we stopped the car, and mark and kaitlyn got out of the car, whilejacqueline remained in the car. we saw 3 flashing lights, moving in unison, in asoutherly direction. after viewing the object for apx 2 minutes, the concensuswas that we were seeing one, very large, triangular object, moving very slowly,and with no apparent means of propulsion, and without any noticable noise. wewatched the object for a total of 3 or 4 minutes, until it was too far away tosee anymore. the object appeared to slowly rotate, along its axis, as wewatched. we couldnt see the surface of the object, but did get the impressionthat it was one large object, rather than 3 small objects.
content.summary: My mother, my children, and i saw a large, triangu
Potential abuduction
Saw rectangular shaped low flying object

content.detailedDescription: my husband and i were outside at about 16:30 on12/29/01, overcast conditions (although a pretty thin cloud cover).  wewitnessed an object which appeared quite large in the sky above us.  it was hardto see a shape, it seemed to be moving in26 out of the cloud cover, or changing shape.  it was black and had no visiblelights.  this lasted for about 2-3 minutes.  then about 1 minute later, we saw ablack, disc-shaped object fall like a leaf out of the sky, above some treesapproximately 1/2 mile away.  after this was seen, we noticed more movement inthe same area of the falling object.  the first thing i thought was, oh, theyrehang gliding!  so, it almost looked like 2 objects in the clouds at this point,maybe triangular shaped.  they seemed to be moving playfully, but it was veryhard to tell because they (or it) were in26 out of the cloud cover like before.  we never noticed the falling objectcoming back up or actually landing.I was able to watch the movement in theclouds for about 10 seconds then they (or it) disappeared, seemingly flying intoheavier cloud cover.These objects or object appeared to be floating or hoveringand actually changing shape with the clouds - its quite hard to describe. there was absolutely no wind, or sound at all.  we thought of kites, hanggliders, planes, weather balloons, none of which seem to fit what we witnessed. we continued to watch the sky for the next 20 minutes, but saw nothing elseunusual.
content.summary: Huge black object(s) in sky
A large low-flying object was sighted

content.detailedDescription: Below is a summary of the 4 page type-written report.I am an elementary school principal for the _________ school district and one ofmy duties is to take our sixth grade class on a one week camp experience at theyfcas camp pendalouan on the north shore of big blue lake.  big blue lake is inthe central portion of muskegon county and is also situated in the midst of themanistee national forest. on the evening of may 21st, mr. _____ and i weremaking our rounds at the cabins making sure that everyone was inside and thatall was well.  lights out at 10pm and the fact that it was thursday, the fourthnight of camp meant that nearly everyone was settled in.  the novelty ofsleepless nights had worn off and the cabins seemed quiet.  at about 10:35pm,___ and i, tired from our walk, sat down on the steps of menominee cabin andtalked about the day and the plans for the next day.  both of us had flashlightswith us...And as we sat on the steps we would occasionally shine the lights upinto the trees to see if we could spot a racoon or two.  overhead  was aclearing in the tree canopy that could have easily been about 24 by 35 ft.  aswe sat there talking, something moving into the opening in the tree canopycaught our eyes at the same instant.  seconds before there was nothing butbright white stars there, now there was something of some size and shape.  both____ and i without a word bolted to our feet and then in very excited voicesbegan yelling to the kids in the now slumbering cabin to "get out here and lookat this".  the object overhead was cylindrical in its shape.  there was a verybright white light in the very front of the object as well as one in the veryrear.  the lights were slightly larger than the stars in proportion.  they didnot blink on and off but rather were intense then would fade into a less intenselight only to brighten again.  we did not see a beam of light nor were there anyother colors of lights.  we were viewing this thing from right underneath. there were no wings, struts, aerials, or apparent markings.  there was howeversomething going on the surface of the craft itself.  i at first felt that wewere looking right through the thing itself as if it were not solid.  but as wewatched it pass in the clearing i got the feeling that it was reflecting theground and the trees over which it was flying. ____ described it as ashimmering......We did not feel any heat, nor smell anything, nor hear anything. its height in the sky was just above the tree tops plus maybe another 100 ft.Or so. the object was going in a solid northerly direction without any lateraldrifting like a plane might do.  its speed was very slow and i would guess thatone could jog along with it and keep up with it.  the whole incident lasted forabout 15 seconds before it became lost to our view.  as a last resort we randown to the lake, hoping that we could get another look at the object in thenight sky, but sadly we did not see it again.
content.summary: Shimmering cylindrical object seen at manistee cam
We observed a large, slow, low flying rectangular
Saw a  slow, low flying large rectangular shaped o

content.detailedDescription: Witness 1: ___ and ___ were sitting by the fire when i left to get somefirewood.  when i returned they were both looking at a "cloud" and some strangelights.  they called me over and i looked up toward the north and saw whatappeared to be a helicopter spotlight going through smoke, but there was nonoise.  when i looked over to the east i saw a "cloud" that looked like a "v"laying on its side.  we all looked back at the expanding and contracting bothup and down, and to the side.  this "cloud" never really moved a great distanceor changed form at all.  when we looked back for the "cloud" it was gone, itleft without a trace. soon after it left the lights dimmed gradually until theywere gone.Witness 2:  we were sitting by the campfire and i got up and walked to the lakeand a bright light caught my eye and i looked up and saw a black v shapedobject.  thats wheni noticed the lights horizontally over the lake. at thispoint i called ____s attention to the black object near the end of the lights. then we told ____ when he came back from getting some wood for the fire.  we saton the dock and watched the lights expand and contract then we looked at theobject andit had moved a little bit, then we looked away and looked back and itwas gone.Witness 3: me and my friends were sitting at the camp fire at approximately11:15 to 11:30 on july 28, 1987 when ____ happened to notice a black cloudshaped like a sideways triangle.  we all went to stand on the dock for a betterview.  we then began to see a light horizontally across the sky over the lake. lights then started to move up and down through the beam.  we then look over tosee the cloud and it was gone.  we couldnt see it anywhere.  we look back atthe lights, some of them were moving back and forth - sideways, expanding thenretreating back.  this lasting maybe 20 minutes.  after that happened it seemedto be fading away to the north end of the lake until it gradually disappeared. we didnt really think about it being a ufo until after.  we were trying tothink of logical things but we didnt hear any noises and there werent anyother noises to distract us from hearing others.
content.summary: 5 students witness strange lights and v-shaped obj

content.detailedDescription: It was 3:00am. and i was watching t.V. in my living room. ihappened to look outof my window,the curtains were open, and i saw a helicopter hovering 100 feetfrom my window,which was elevated 20 feet. i noticed the spheres dart past 3feet from my window, trailing white sparks,not fire like,just white. they cameback and hovered 3 feet from my window, then quickly, but smoothly took off,trailing orange sparks.
content.summary: A four foot ball of metal sparks,hovering and dart

content.detailedDescription: At 22:05 (16:05 gmt) i was at the roof of my house playing with my dog, i waslaying on my back looking at the stars while playing with him when i spotted alight on the sky, it was moving from south to east in a straight light pattern,it stopped and stayed there for about five minutes then it started to move backand forth with the forth movement being longer and it advanced like this forabout five minutes until it started to vanish, the object was gold coppered incolor and twice the size compared with a normal star. i was calmed yet surprisedduring and after the sighting.
content.summary: Light in the sky
A growing light in the sky
Saw several lights in a circle in front and above
Sudden atmospheric change, chase in the woods, mis

content.detailedDescription: Witness 1s narrative: at appox. 11:00 pm on may 5th, as i was preparing for bedmy mother asked me to look at some lights in the sky.  i first viewed theobjects thru a small bedroom window.  to get a better look we both stepped outon the porch facing west. at first i thought they were being generated from ahigh-power searchlight, but there was no visible beam to support the lights. there were three lights moving in a counter-clockwise direction.  they seemed tobe playing a game of tag-the 3 followed each other until they seemed to blendinto one much brighter light.  the meeting lasted about one second then thegame would continue.  the sky was clear that night - stars were veryvisible...But the 3 objects seemed to be contained within the parameter of thecloud (the cloud was a part of the sky that looked lighter).  they never leftthe outline of the cloud, their movement was very rapid but with no realconsistency of speed. the distance the 3 kept between themselves varied.  aplane (not sure the size of the plane) approached from the west to the east.  incomparison to the objects, the plane was much smaller and moved much lower - itflew way beneath the lights.  by 11:30 on of the lights was no longer visibleand the remaining two were dimmer and slower - they still chased each other butdidnt meet together.  i  got the feeling they were searching for the 3rd light. the objects didnt seem to affect anything on the ground; there was no unusualsound, smell, or feeling.  i stopped watching at 11:30.
content.summary: Rotating lights seen near gaines, michigan

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting watching television.We just gotcable tv.The movie channel intro was starting then got fuzzy.We heard screamingand mom went to front door window and said dave a ufo! i got up and ran towindow and across the street saw a huge craft over neighbors trees. could seewindows and inside craft but no people. neighbors all came into middle ofstreet.Girls were screaming terrified. we huddled in fright. neighbor was sonervous hands tremored badly so he couldnt open front door to get camera. objectcame from raynam hill went over airport then to fort nathan hale.There were morewitneses there and 2 policeman reported it in the new haven register the nextday. not sure if it was westchester boomerang because outline of ship was sodark it was hard to tell shape but windows were clear as day. it was about 9pm
content.summary: Saw large silent craft over house next to tweed nh
2 white lights, disappear, reappear closer, visibl
